title: What is the largest march in US history? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: If your talking about marches that sadly turned into rioting Then is none other than The Black Lives Matter 2020 riot extravaganza --- 2020 United States racial unrest. It had a estimative 15 to 26 million participants.  The most peaceful March in history is the March for women in 2017; it happened literally the day after Trump's inauguration.
